translations: v.砍，劈；砍成，劈出（某种形状）；遵循，坚持（hew的现在分词）

sentences.sentence: The farmer spent a day in the woods hewing timber.
sentences.translation: 这个农夫花了一天时间在森林里砍木材。

sentences.sentence: But this year things arent quite hewing to past form.
sentences.translation: 但是今年的情况与以往不同。

sentences.sentence: Hewing out of the mountain of despair a stone of hope!
sentences.translation: 在绝望的大山上砍下一块希望的石头！
